caption.p: PCs scatter plot of Angolan Lippia multiflora Moldenke essential oils. The x, y, and z axes exhibit the distribution of each oil according to their antibacterial activity against Streptococcus aureus, Pseudomonas aeruginosa and Escherichia coli. A = L1; B = L2; C = L3; D = L4; E = L5; F = L6; G = L7; H = L8a; I = L8b; J = L9a; K = L9b.
